module.name: Bulk Handler
module.changelog: *13.0.6* Require Asterisk to be running *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9712 add progress bar and use action bar *13.0.5* Fix invalid looping errors *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9594 slightly better name for exported file *13.0.3* Fixes to functionality *13.0.2* Initial release to the world!
